reviewText: This was my favorite when I was growing up, and I got it again to reminisce. Beautiful imagery, with very good narration.
This is a beautiful narration of the story. It is not animated. Lovely artwork that illustrates the story are shown along with the narration.

I am currently trying to write a novel based on this norwegian folk tale. It is a favorite story of mine. But I would like to give it a grown up touch, that way women of all ages can enjoy such a beautiful love story. The musical score is very beautiful, and I would recommend this to anyone
